bibles.title: The Susu Bible in Arabic Script
bibles.description: The Bible in the Susu language of Guinea, using Arabic Script

language.name: Susu
language.area: Mainly southwest and west. Also in Guinea-Bissau, Senegal, Sierra Leone.

language.name: Halh Mongolian
language.area: Former Buryat Autonomous Soviet Socialist Republic of the Russian Federation and Issyk-Kul Oblast of Kyrgyzstan. Also in Kyrgyzstan, Russian Federation (Asia), Taiwan, United States.

language.area: Punjab, Majhi in Gurdaspur and Amritsar districts, South Firozpur District, Bhatyiana; Rajasthan, north Ganganagar District, Bhatyiana; Haryana; Delhi; Jammu and Kashmir. Also in Bangladesh, Canada, Fiji, Kenya, Libya, Malaysia (Peninsular), Mauritius, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States.

language.name: Sundanese

bibles.title: Pakistani Yousafzai Pashto Bible
bibles.description:
Holy Bible in Pakistani (Yousafzai) Pashto.
This translation in Pashto is in the Yousafzai dialect, widely spoken and/or understood in Pakistan.
This full bible was printed in 2020 and is available from
 www.AfghanMediaCentre.org
Digitally available on
www.PashtoZeray.org/bible
bibles.description_vernacular:
کِتابِ مقدس د پاکستان په (يوسفزئ) پښتو کښې
دا پوره کِتابِ مقدس په ٢٠٢٠ کښې چاپ شو او په دې لنک باندې ملاويدے شى
او په ډيجيټل حالت کښې په دې لنک باندې ملاويدے شى

language.name: Northern Pashto
language.area: Afghanistan border, most of NWFP, Yusufzai, and Peshawar. Also in Afghanistan, Canada, India, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States.

bibles.title: The Bible in Yoruba
bibles.description: The Bible Society of Nigeria translates, publishes and distributes the Bible in formats that interest readers and at competitive costs. The Bible Society of Nigeria is the biggest Bible organisation in Nigeria with many local language translations. The organisation ensures that people engage and interact with the Word of God in a manner that would bring the desired God transformation in their lives.

language.name: Yoruba
language.area: Most of Oyo, Ogun, Ondo, Osun, Kwara, and Lagos states; Kogi state, west LGAs. Also in Benin, Sierra Leone, Togo, United Kingdom, United States.

language.name: Haryanvi
language.area: Haryana; Rajasthan; Punjab; Karnataka; Delhi; Himachal Pradesh; Uttar Pradesh.

language.name: Bilaspuri
language.area: Himachal Pradesh, Bilaspur District.

bibles.description: Revised Edition of Punjabi New Testament 1952 © British and Foreign Bible Society, used by permission.

language.name: Western Panjabi

language.name: Ganda

bibles.title: Bible in Runyoro-Rutooro 1964 Version
bibles.description_vernacular: Pao Kurireu meardu kurire boei rugadu. Dukodire ure tonaregedu mitodu rawuje baru piji mato boe etae. Meartorure jiwuge eiamedu boe ewimodukare pugeje. Meartorure jiwuge emugumode Pao Kurireu apo rugadu. Du akedumodukare rugadu.

language.name: Nyoro
language.area: West, Hoima, Masindi, Bundibugyo, Kamwenge, and Kibale districts, south and southeast of Lake Albert.

bibles.title: Yoruba Contemporary Bible
bibles.title_vernacular: Bíbélì Mímọ́ ní Èdè Yorùbá Òde-Òní
bibles.description_vernacular: Ajọ Biblica, The International Bible Society, ń pèsè ọ̀rọ̀ Ọlọ́run fún àwọn ènìyàn nípa títúmọ̀, títa Bíbélì jáde jákèjádò orílẹ̀-èdè Afíríkà, Asia, Pacific, Europe, Latin America, Middle East àti North America. Àjọ Bíbílíkà ń mú kí àwọn ènìyàn ayé bá Ọlọ́run pàdé nípasẹ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀, láti yí ìgbé ayé wọn padà nípasẹ̀ ìbásepọ̀ àti àjọdàpọ̀ wọn pẹ̀lú Jesu Kristi.

language.name: Yoruba
language.area: Most of Oyo, Ogun, Ondo, Osun, Kwara, and Lagos states; Kogi state, west LGAs. Also in Benin, Sierra Leone, Togo, United Kingdom, United States.

language.name: Central Kurdish - Sorani

bibles.title: Igbo Union Version
bibles.title_vernacular: Bịabụlụ Nsọ nʼIgbo Ndị Ugbu a

language.name: Igbo
language.area: Abia state, Anambra state, Aguata, Anambra, Awka, Idemili, Ihiala, Njikoka, Nnewi, and Onitsha LGAs; Enugu state, Awgu, Enugu, Ezeagu, Igo-Etiti, Igbo-Eze, Isi-Uzo, Nkanu, Nsukka, Udi, and Uzo-Uwani LGAs; Imo state; Rivers state, Ikwerre, Bonny, and Ahoada LGAs; Delta state, Oshimili, Aniocha, and Ndokwa LGAs; Akwa Ibom state, Ika LGA. The only or majority language in Abia, Anambra, Ebonyi, Enugu, and Imo. Also in northeast Delta state and southeast Rivers state, Oyigbo LGA and Opobo part of Opobo-Nkoro LGA, and alongside Ibani [iby] in Bonny LGA.

Also in Afghanistan, Azerbaijan, Belarus, China, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Moldova, Tajikistan, Turkey (Europe), Turkmenistan, Ukraine, United States, Uzbekistan.

bibles.title: The Bible in Datooga
bibles.description: The Bible in Datooga © Bible Society of Tanzania, 2015.
bibles.description_vernacular: Bibliyeeda Ghaydit: Gidamadeeda geebadiischeesi ASEETA hoauur aba gidagoondaneasa miyeenoadaanyi ea ghawooda ea uurda sisini gadiyeeda ng'oorda Bibliya aba iita Datooga. Gadiyeeni nisik gheatkweaka saang'a ea ghwahita duleanooda. Ak ghamneawa geebadiischeesi ASEETA aba gideaba ninung' eamuusa giihiiteaba gadiyeeni.

language.name: Datooga
language.area: Singida and Manyara regions; Mara region, Bunda and Serengeti districts. Barabaig mainly in north volcanic highlands near Mt. Hanang.

language.name: Teso

language.name: Turkana

language.name: Konkomba

language.name: Yao

language.name: Zigula
